column5: Well what a great day in the kawartha's so a pal and i decided to try are luck on stoney lived here my hole life and never fished it. First of what a beautiful lake this time of year. There are some awsome cottages out there.    We lunched the boat at carveths marina on the south side of the lake off stoney lake rd. With lots of warm sun and just a little wind. I had a hit almost right away then that was itfor a couple of hrs. Talked to some other fishermen they said they had been out all morning and only had a couple of small largies. We did end up with a couple like this.    Anyway this is a great looking lake and i will have to try it again next summer
Tough to navigate that lake, lots of unmarked rocks!
Is this the one you had the expert pilot drive you around on for a minute or two?
nice was up there a few weeks ago caught a few nice wallys, one muskie and a few small bass. Dangerous lake if your not use to it for sure. Sea Gulls standing on the water???
